fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player. Learn who they targeted on every night before this one.
- After participating in a secured node, during the day, select a player and read a book on their history, learning what roles they rerolled out of, or the lack of any if applicable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first ability does not tell you who your target is targeting tonight.
- Your second ability will be in order, but not specify if it was a global or same-slot reroll. You also only learn roles they rerolled, not the one they kept.

fields.name: For Noodle:
fields.value:
* NTF color is #78FF77
* The goal: "Eliminate threats to the digital world, or resecure it to deny access to the enemy."
